parameters.name: AppKey
parameters.description: The app key that is used to make an API call.

parameters.name: EnableTagAuth
parameters.description: Specifies whether to enable tag verification.

parameters.name: PageNumber
parameters.description: The number of the page to return. Pages start from page 1. Default value: 1.

parameters.name: PageSize
parameters.description: The number of entries to return on each page. Maximum value: 100. Default value: 10.

parameters.name: Sort
parameters.description:
The order. Valid values: asc and desc. Default value: desc.

*   asc: The apps are displayed in ascending order of modification time.
*   desc: The apps are displayed in descending order of modification time.

parameters.name: Tag
parameters.description: The tag of objects that match the rule. You can specify multiple tags.
